data.comment: The match has started.
John Beaton signals a throw-in for Hibernian, close to St Johnstone's area.
In the minute 1, John Beaton awards the home team a throw-in.
Can St Johnstone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hibernian's half?
Throw-in Hibernian.
In the minute 2, Martin Boyle for Hibernian drives towards goal at McDiarmid Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Hibernian have been awarded a corner by John Beaton.
Corner awarded to Hibernian.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Hibernian is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for St Johnstone in the half of Hibernian.
St Johnstone push forward at McDiarmid Park and Danny McNamara gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hibernian defence.
In the minute 5, St Johnstone to take a throw-in in Hibernian territory.
Hibernian have a goal kick.
John Beaton signals a Hibernian throw-in in St Johnstone's half.
In the minute 6, Free kick Hibernian.
Christian Doidge (Hibernian) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
St Johnstone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for St Johnstone in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for St Johnstone at McDiarmid Park.
In the minute 10, In Perth a free kick has been awarded the home team.
St Johnstone have been awarded a corner by John Beaton.
St Johnstone are coming forward and Callum Hendry gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Hibernian at McDiarmid Park.
Corner awarded to St Johnstone.
Free kick for Hibernian in the half of St Johnstone.
Throw-in for Hibernian close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, At McDiarmid Park, Danny McNamara has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ball safe as St Johnstone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 16, Can Hibernian capitalize from this throw-in deep inside St Johnstone's half?
John Beaton signals a free kick to St Johnstone in their own half.
John Beaton awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for St Johnstone in the half of Hibernian.
Throw-in for Hibernian at McDiarmid Park.
Throw-in for Hibernian in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in Hibernian.
John Beaton signals a free kick to Hibernian.
St Johnstone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Paul Hanlon (Hibernian) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Hibernian in their own half.
St Johnstone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Hibernian awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can St Johnstone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hibernian's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Hibernian goal kick.
In the minute 26, Hibernian's Martin Boyle breaks free at McDiarmid Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Perth.
Hibernian have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 28, John Beaton signals a Hibernian throw-in in St Johnstone's half.
Martin Boyle for Hibernian is whistled offside.
St Johnstone have been awarded a corner by John Beaton.
In the minute 31, St Johnstone's Callum Hendry is whistled for offside at McDiarmid Park.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
John Beaton signals a free kick to Hibernian just outside St Johnstone's area.
In the minute 33, Free kick for St Johnstone in their own half.
Corner awarded to St Johnstone.
St Johnstone to take a throw-in in Hibernian territory.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Hibernian at McDiarmid Park.
St Johnstone needs to be cautious. Hibernian have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Hibernian!
In the minute 37, Christian Doidge heads the ball against the upright! Almost a goal there for Hibernian.
John Beaton awards St Johnstone a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for St Johnstone in Perth.
In the minute 38, Free kick for St Johnstone in the half of Hibernian.
Can Hibernian get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in St Johnstone's half?
Hibernian have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 41, Alexander Gogic for Hibernian gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
John Beaton awards St Johnstone a goal kick.
Throw-in for St Johnstone in their own half.
In the minute 43, John Beaton signals a free kick to Hibernian in their own half.
In Perth a free kick has been awarded the away team.
St Johnstone have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Hibernian in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at McDiarmid Park.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, St Johnstone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Hibernian.
Hibernian awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for St Johnstone in the half of Hibernian.
St Johnstone pushes forward through Liam Craig, whose finish on goal is saved.
St Johnstone have been awarded a corner by John Beaton.
In the minute 50, St Johnstone surge into the attack at McDiarmid Park but Jason Kerrâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Hibernian at McDiarmid Park.
Free kick St Johnstone.
In the minute 53, St Johnstone's Liam Craig gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hibernian goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, John Beaton signals a free kick to St Johnstone.
St Johnstone to take a throw-in in Hibernian territory.
John Beaton signals a free kick to Hibernian in their own half.
In the minute 55, Callum Hendry for St Johnstone has been booked by John Beaton and receives a first yellow card.
Important block from the St Johnstone defence as Martin Boyle fires in a strike for Hibernian.
Ball safe as Hibernian is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, John Beaton signals a free kick to Hibernian in their own half.
In Perth a free kick has been awarded the away team.
John Beaton awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Hibernian.
In Perth, Callum Hendry of St Johnstone is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Hibernian at McDiarmid Park.
In the minute 61, The away team have replaced Daryl Horgan with Drey Wright. This is the first substitution made today by Jack Ross.
Free kick for St Johnstone in their own half.
Scott Allan (Hibernian) has received a yellow card from John Beaton.
In the minute 63, Callum Davidson (St Johnstone) is making a first substitution, with David Wotherspoon replacing Craig Conway.
Throw-in for St Johnstone close to the penalty box.
Stevie May is replacing Callum Hendry for St Johnstone at McDiarmid Park.
In the minute 65, John Beaton awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for St Johnstone in their own half.
Hibernian make their second substitution with Stevie Mallan replacing Scott Allan.
In the minute 67, Free kick St Johnstone.
St Johnstone attack but Jason Kerr's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Perth.
In the minute 68, John Beaton signals a Hibernian throw-in in St Johnstone's half.
Ball goes out of play for a St Johnstone goal kick.
St Johnstone to take a throw-in in Hibernian territory.
In the minute 70, Ball safe as Hibernian is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hibernian awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can St Johnstone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hibernian's half?
In the minute 72, John Beaton signals a throw-in for St Johnstone, close to Hibernian's area.
St Johnstone are pushing forward but Liam Craig's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Perth.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for St Johnstone in their own half.
Jack Ross is making the team's third substitution at McDiarmid Park with Jamie Gullan replacing Josh Doig.
Jack Ross is making the team's fourth substitution at McDiarmid Park with Melker Hallberg replacing Joe Newell.
In the minute 75, Hibernian awarded a free kick in their own half.
St Johnstone needs to be cautious. Hibernian have an attacking throw-in.
John Beaton signals a St Johnstone throw-in in Hibernian's half.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Hibernian in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hibernian.
John Beaton awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 79, St Johnstone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Hibernian at McDiarmid Park.
Can St Johnstone capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hibernian's half?
In the minute 82, St Johnstone are in shooting range from this free kick.
St Johnstone's Scott Tanser gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hibernian defender.
John Beaton awards Hibernian a goal kick.
In the minute 84, Hibernian awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in St Johnstone.
Ball safe as St Johnstone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 85, St Johnstone have a goal kick.
Throw-in for St Johnstone in the half of Hibernian.
Throw-in for Hibernian at McDiarmid Park.
Throw-in high up the field for St Johnstone in Perth.
In the minute 87, Callum Davidson (St Johnstone) is making a third substitution, with John Robertson replacing Michael O`Halloran.
John Beaton signals a free kick to St Johnstone in their own half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Hibernian get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in St Johnstone's half?
Hibernian have a dangerous throw-in.
Hibernian have been awarded a corner by John Beaton.
In Perth, Christian Doidge (Hibernian) misses the target with a header.
Hibernian have been awarded a penalty...
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Perth.
St Johnstone to take a throw-in in Hibernian territory.
The match has come to a close in Perth. The final score is 0-1.
St Johnstone's Liam Craig has been booked in Perth.
It's advantage Hibernian in Perth as Stevie Mallan scores from the spot to make it 0-1.
